name: health-skillz
title: Health Record Assistant
description: Analyze personal health records via SMART on FHIR. Connect to Epic and other patient portals to let Claude explore your labs, medications, conditions, clinical notes, and more.
author: Joshua Mandel
features: Full FHIR data sync (labs, meds, conditions, procedures, immunizations)
Clinical notes extraction from visit notes and discharge summaries
Multi-provider support for comprehensive health analysis
End-to-end encryption - only Claude can decrypt your data
Download complete JSON export of your records
